entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing inputs in the key file #65474
    17.5
  • Receiver of a call taking InterpolatedStringHandler is unexpectedly copied in a way that mutations performed by the method are not observable #65470
  • Extract Method in file with top-level statements results in compile error #65465
  • Revise `ContainsDiagnostics` usages in parser #65464
  • Extract Method does not reproduce nullability of generic parameters of method parameters #65456
    Backlog
  • Question: Roslyn version in Visual Studio 17.4? #65455

Closed

  • Altering the preprocessor symbols with Project.WithParseOptions() does not re-evaluate conditionally included documents #65461
  • Test failed in CI: ExpanderAvailableWhenNotInTypeContextButNotAddingAnyItems #65362
    17.5
  • The `RefKind` of implicitly-typed lambda parameters should always be `RefKind.None` #64985
    17.5
  • C# compiler: severe performance issues with sister project #65142
    17.5
  • CA2252 - Static Abstract Build Error with Preview Features Enabled #65460
  • Servicing branches for releases #65174
  • ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe or devenv.exe could consume a CPU core permanently #65356
    17.5
  • VisualSudio 17.4 and Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* 4.3.1 ignore WhiteSpace in VS-Settings or WorkSapce.CurrentSolution.Options respectively #65360
    17.4
  • No completion for parameter names inside `nameof` in attributes #65419
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Use [Fact] not [WpfFact] #65473
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused MismatchedParameterDefaultValue enum value #65472
    Area-Compilers
  • Create a new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run the conditional-token-placement fixer on roslyn #65469
    Area-IDE
  • Enable member edit analysis when LSP pull diagnostics is on #65468
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add experimental formatting option to control places of `?` and `:` in a conditional expression. #65467
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for unused parameters in source #65466
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65459
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Check type parameter index bounds when parsing `DocumentationCommentId` #65457
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65453
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block #65452
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for multiple blank lines in source #65451
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Add unit test entrypoint to just find a single result #65437
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix flaky test #65383
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Consult secondary index to avoid looking in a document for unit-test matches. #65436
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implicitly-typed lambda parameters have RefKind.None #65350
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` feature #65438
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Correct `Nullable<T>.Equals()` calls in `BoundNode.Update()` #65398
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65382
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65385
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65454
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65445
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path in OOP #65212
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65420
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add a separate option to control solution crawler's support of generators #65268
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 17.4: Convert symbol-search crash to NFW #65280
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing

Updated

  • Support new all-in-one-symbol-search APIs. #65449
    Area-IDE
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - try catch snippet #65101
    Area-IDE
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Convert parser warning into a binding warning. #65440
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose constructor that allows for AnalysisOptions and a CancellationToken. #65051
    Area-Analyzers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure the causing syntax node is always in the timing dictionary #65321
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.5
  • Attempt an alternative implementation of AsyncQueue #65080
    Area-Compilers
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enhances the set of cases 'use pattern matching' works for. #65314
    Area-IDE
  • Allow usage of ref structs in VB despite CompilerFeatureRequired #65431
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE
  • Refine error recovery in the parser around top level statements #65262
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Annotate implementations of IRangeVariableSymbol #39202
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
